page.title: 04RECREATION IN LOWER PENARTH
page.content: Lower Penarth has much recreational land serving the people.Organised sports are provided on council_owned playing fields at{Penarth Athletic {ground,}Cwrt_y_vil and the{miniature {golfcourse}at Cliff Walk, catering for local residents and tourists.The Vale of{Glamorgan Council}provide the facilities. Public tennis is played at the{Athletic field.}Penarth Athletic Club promotes sport and raises monies for the individual sections by running social activities in the new clubhouse {The Penarth Rugby Club}has 3 senior,1 mini rugby section.The annual Good Friday{Barbarian_Penarth match}will cease at Easter 1986. Penarth's men's and ladies' hockey teams and the three Penarth cricket club's three teams compete in various{South Wales leagues Special events take place during the {Holiday week}in July.
